0.text: Innate: Renata's basic attacks are empowered to apply a mark that lasts 6 seconds, refreshes on subsequent hits and expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, the attack also deals bonus magic damage equal to 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
0.html: Innate: Renata's basic attacks are empowered to apply a mark that lasts 6 seconds, refreshes on subsequent hits and expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, the attack also deals bonus magic damage equal to 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
markedPassages: 1% − 2% (based on level)

1.text: Allied  champions' damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal additional bonus magic damage equal to 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
1.html: Allied champions' damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal additional bonus magic damage equal to 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
markedPassages: champions'
1% − 2% (based on level)

2.text: Leverage's damage is capped at 150 against  monsters.
2.html: Leverage's damage is capped at 150 against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

0.text: Active: Renata fires a hook in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  roots them for 1 second, during which they are  revealed.If the  root was applied, Renata forms a  tether between her and the target for the same duration, causing Renata to become unable to declare attacks and have her movement speed reduced by 30%.
0.html:
Active: Renata fires a hook in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and roots them for 1 second, during which they are revealed.

If the root was applied, Renata forms a tether between her and the target for the same duration, causing Renata to become unable to declare attacks and have her movement speed reduced by 30%.
markedPassages: roots
revealed
root
tether

1.text: Handshake can be recast while the tether is active.
1.html: Handshake can be recast while the tether is active.

2.text: Recast: Renata breaks the tether to  knock the target in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. If the thrown target is a  champion, all secondary targets hit are  stunned for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast: Renata breaks the tether to knock the target in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. If the thrown target is a champion, all secondary targets hit are stunned for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: knock
champion
stunned

0.text: Active: Renata infuses herself or the target allied champion with a chemtech formula for 5 seconds, granting the target  bonus attack speed in addition to  bonus movement speed while they are facing nearby  visible enemy champions and minions, both increasing in effectiveness by 100% over the duration. Bailout's duration resets whenever the target scores a  takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them.
0.html:
Active: Renata infuses herself or the target allied champion with a chemtech formula for 5 seconds, granting the target  bonus attack speed in addition to  bonus movement speed while they are facing nearby visible enemy champions and minions, both increasing in effectiveness by 100% over the duration.
Bailout's duration resets whenever the target scores a takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
bonus movement speed
visible
takedown

1.text: If the target takes  fatal damage while Bailout is active, they are restored to 100% of their maximum health but suffer a  true damage burn equal to 10% of their maximum health every 0.264 seconds until they die from reaching 0 health, during which Bailout's duration resets every 0.25 seconds. This effect may occur only once per application of Bailout while the target already has the buff and is not burning.During this time, if they score a  takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them, the burn is stopped prematurely and they are set to 20% of their maximum health.
1.html:
If the target takes fatal damage while Bailout is active, they are restored to 100% of their maximum health but suffer a  true damage burn equal to 10% of their maximum health every 0.264 seconds until they die from reaching 0 health, during which Bailout's duration resets every 0.25 seconds. This effect may occur only once per application of Bailout while the target already has the buff and is not burning.
During this time, if they score a takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them, the burn is stopped prematurely and they are set to 20% of their maximum health.
markedPassages: fatal damage
true damage
takedown

0.text: Active: Renata sends out chemtech rockets from either side of her that instantly strike targets around her. After 0.429 seconds they converge and travel to the target location as a single missile, striking targets along its path and exploding upon reaching the target location.
0.html: Active: Renata sends out chemtech rockets from either side of her that instantly strike targets around her. After 0.429 seconds they converge and travel to the target location as a single missile, striking targets along its path and exploding upon reaching the target location.

1.text: Renata and allies struck are granted a  shield for 3 seconds and enemies struck are dealt magic damage and  slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
1.html: Renata and allies struck are granted a shield for 3 seconds and enemies struck are dealt magic damage and slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: shield
slowed

2.text: Loyalty Program will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Loyalty Program will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Loyalty Program will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Renata launches a cloud of potent chemicals that travels in the target direction, granting  sight of its surroundings. Enemy champions and minions hit become  berserk for a duration.
0.html: Active: Renata launches a cloud of potent chemicals that travels in the target direction, granting sight of its surroundings. Enemy champions and minions hit become berserk for a duration.
markedPassages: sight
berserk

1.text:
Berserked units gain 100% bonus attack speed and 25% increased size. Within their targeting radius, they prioritize attacking the closest unit by the following categories in descending order:
Their allied champions
Allied non-champions
Allied  wards
Enemy units (including  monsters)
1.html:
Berserked units gain 100% bonus attack speed and 25% increased size. Within their targeting radius, they prioritize attacking the closest unit by the following categories in descending order:

  1. Their allied champions
  2. Allied non-champions
  3. Allied wards
  4. Enemy units (including monsters)
markedPassages: wards
monsters
